channel.title: 1 Introduction on Kakip Techdoc
channel.description: Recent content in 1 Introduction on Kakip Techdoc

item.title: 1.1 Overview
item.description: Kakip is based on the Renesas RZ/V2H processor. It features a quad-core Cortex-A55 CPU subsystem at 1.1GHz for system control, Cortex-R8 Dual subsystem for low-latency I/O and control, Coretx-M33, with 80TOPS AI Accelerator, DRP-AI3 and dynamically reconfigurable processor(DRP).

item.title: 1.2 Features
item.description: CPU: Cortex-A55 Quad 1.1GHz, Cortex-R8 Dual 800MHz, Cortex-M33 200MHz NPU: DRP-AI3 (INT8) / DRP (STP4) AI performance: up to 80TOPS (sparse) I/O controller: - GPU: Mali-G31 Memory: LPDDR4 1333MHz (2GByte, 4GByte, 8GByte) RTC: built-in, powered from external battery Ethernet: Gigabit Ethernet Camera In: MIPI-CSI 4Lane x 4 (22pin/0.5mm) Display Out: MIPI-DSI 4Lane x 1 (22pin/0.5mm) HDMI: - DP: - Audio: - ISP: Mali-C55 (option) PCIe: PCIe 3.0 x 1 USB: Type A x 2 (USB 3.

item.title: 1.3 Mechanical Specifications
item.description: Dimansion: L89 mm x W58 mm x H20 mm Weight:
